name: 2016 Dinosaur Hunting Park: Reload Dino World Wild Animal Safari Hunt Season
name_original: 2016 Dinosaur Hunting Park: Reload Dino World Wild Animal Safari Hunt Season
description:
*** Welcome to the Dangerous Jurassic Era!***

The most realistic Dinosaur hunting on the iPhone returns with an all new adventure: "2016 Dinosaur Hunting park".

Dinosaur hunting game which will take you in a new real hunting adventure in the jungle featuring a wide variety of wild Dino...Explore and kill the most dangerous Dino in Jurassic environment and save yourself from deadly creatures.

Shoot the Dinosaur to stay alive...Prepare yourself for hunting adventure in Jurassic land!

Some practice will make you an expert in hunting!!! Try to make perfect yourself***

***HUNT DINO TO SURVIVE***

Zoom in and out to shoot your target and explore the Jurassic Land and hunting missions to enjoy the exciting levels...

REALISTIC SNIPER GUNS
Choose from a variety of customizable Guns such as the Rifle, Shotgun, Crossbow and more!

HUNT DINOSAURS
Journey to a hidden Dinosaur, Hunt the most ferocious Dino in history.Experience the Real 3D Jurassic Era...

AMAZING 3D ADVENTURE!!!
In this simulator game you will experience real time wildlife 3D Adventure with amazing forest journeys of hunt and survival.

Game features!!!
*Dangerous dinosaurs to kill and shoot.
*A wide range of exciting Dinosaurs.
*NEW Realistic physics to feel the hunting game.
*Explore different Jurassic worlds & new hunter missions.
*FEEL the real 3D environments on your iPhone.
*Stunning Deep Visuals, Soundtrack & Sounds.
*Real 3D environments, with zoom in camera views.
*GameCenter and leaderboard.
*Challenge your friends & Beat them.

Download Now our new thrilling game "2016 Dinosaur Hunting park : Reload Dino world wild animal safari hunt Season"

We would really appreciate your review and rating.

We always try to give our best and exciting mobile games for users on AppStore...
